title: Rapid Charging - Pixel 4 XL
content:
I have a wireless charger that I use to recharge my phone. It always shows "rapid charging" when my phone is on the stand. The other day, I noticed I no longer see "rapid charging". I now see a time to full charge there instead. Right now, on the stand, it shows 98% -8 min until charged.

If I plug my phone directly into the factory charger with the factory cable, it shows the same info.

How do I fix this so it shows rapid charging again?
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 4 XL
